actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to make emergency operating loans available to certain producers.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make available, through the Commodity Credit Corporation, emergency operating loans to: (1) producers who will meet eligibility conditions for loans, purchases, and payments under the Agricultural Act of 1949 with respect to their 1980 crops; and (2) producers of livestock, dairy products, and poultry and poultry products whose farm income is derived primarily therefrom. Sets forth conditions, purposes, amounts, interest rates, and repayment schedules relating to such loans. Directs the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service to administer, and the Secretary to issue, necessary regulations for this Act.

titles.title: A bill to make emergency operating loans available to certain producers.
